topic.title: User roles
topic.p: The role assigned to you will depend on your account at %product_cloud%:

li.a: You created a commercial account for your company
You joined an existing company after creating a commercial account

chapter.title: Administrator
chapter.p: If you just created a personal account at %product_cloud%, or a commercial account for a company that did not previously exist, you will join %product_cloud% as administrator. The basic administrator functionalities include:

list.li: Managing account, including complete deletion from %product_cloud%

chapter.p: If you have a commercial account, you will also be able to:

list.li: Invite new users to join your company in %product_cloud%
Manage the existing members of your company
Group the existing users and reports

chapter.title: Editor
chapter.p: If you just joined an existing company, your role will be editor and you will be able to:

list.li: Manage your account, including the complete deletion from %product_cloud%

chapter.p: Any editor can be promoted to administrator , see the Change user roles section.
